name: Hotel Capitelli

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel Capitelli is in a newly constructed building so it is very nice, clean, and cozy. The hotel is very quiet because it does not sit on a busy street. That being said, it is still well located near the main Piazza. The only negative aspect was that the walls were surprisingly thin so we could hear people walking around upstairs and downstairs which was a little annoying. The absence of any carpets in the building makes it worse but this is typical of many mid-range Italian hotels. Breakfast was pretty meager and offered yogurt, packaged brioche, juices, toast, hot tea and coffee....it could be improved. We paid 90 euros for a Friday night stay in late October which struck me as being a little pricey as we stayed during what I thought was the off season, but it was still a decent value.
reviews.title: Affordable and Cozy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the Hotel Capitelli in lovely Triest and had a great stay. The hotel is small but the rooms were clean and had a romantic charm with wooden floors and trim -- just the bathrooms had tiles. Getting there by foot at first with luggage might makes the location a bit out-of-the-way but once there this seemed to be a strong advantage in favor of the location. It is located in Triest's historic center. The Roman Arch-- Arco d'Ricardo-- which once served as the main gateway to the city --is just around the corner seemed to prove the historic significance of the neighborhood. The hotel is located on a small side street which made it charming. The service was quite friendly and breakfast was served in a small dining area just across the main entrance. The price, which was €90 (Euro) or about $132 a night for a double room included breakfast, and seemed to compare favorably with other rates we checked out for the city in November--which I is not high season.
reviews.title: Romantic stay in Triest

likes.liked: — Nice quaint hotel with good facilities and friendly service
